sections.body: During Combat The ranger shoots at opponents who attempt to harm innocents or his allies. If trying to capture someone alive, he uses a tanglefoot bag. If trying to disperse a hostile crowd, he throws a thunderstone.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: The town watcher protects a settlement from hostile creatures.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Ranger/Rangers/Town Watcher/Colin Fletcher

sections.body: Colin vigilantly guards his town, and is quick to respond if any visitors start fights or cause trouble with locals.
Colin fires a warning shot from a rooftop to distract unruly adventurers in town, or uses a tanglefoot bag on a PC who's obviously drunk, raging, or out of control.
Colin is the eyes and ears for his town, and is a source of valuable information about the comings and goings of strangers.
